name: Cyclops Myrmidon
description: The Cyclops Myrmidon is a huge, powerful giant that excels in melee combat, utilizing its significant strength to deliver devastating blows. It possesses a rugged physique and a single eye, showcasing its cyclopean heritage.
memorable: The cyclops can attack with great power despite being limited by its poor depth perception, making it a fearsome opponent up close.
goals: To dominate opponents in melee combat and withstand damage during battles.
relations: May be encountered alongside other giants or creatures of strength.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or vast open areas.
strengths: High hit points and exceptional melee damage output with multiattack capabilities.
weaknesses: Struggles with ranged attacks due to Poor Depth Perception, making it less effective at a distance.
attacks: Capable of executing powerful melee attacks with a club and throwing large rocks.
most_powerful_ability: Panicked Rage, granting advantage on attack rolls when frightened.
skills: Limited skills in animal handling and survival due to low intelligence and average perception.
additional_information: Unique cyclopic characteristics with a single eye.
Can retaliate with a powerful strike after being hit thanks to Big Windup.
Once per day, can remove debilitating conditions with Thick Skulled.
test_queries: huge giant with powerful melee attacks
strong cyclops that struggles with ranged combat
melee combatant giant with single eye
